name: The Telepathy Club and the Summer Festival
name_original: The Telepathy Club and the Summer Festival
description:
"If you wanted to make friends, how would you start?"

"I'd start a club."

You've recently moved into a new town, hoping your telepathy-riddled problems will take care of themselves. You're already used to a quiet, uneventful life when you meet a pair of best friends that promise to change that. Summer is almost ending,  but maybe it's just the fresh start you need. 

Features:

  • two male romanceable love interests
  • two hair color choices to customize your renameable MC
  • original art assets
  • no bad endings

Please look forward to The Telepathy Club and the Haunted House Project!
